post:
Woah, time does fly by so fast. After moving to our new office this weekend, we can present you our offer! Our DC is only 2 ms from DE-CIX away which is a great advantage. 
Please note that our office adress changed. Phone number stays the same.


**Some facts:**
Our nodes:
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz,
RAM: 32 GB
RAID10 with enterprise drives (SSDs coming soon, maybe as well as SSD CACHING)
OpenVZ virtualized
[Location: Germany, Frankfurt](http://www.rootnerds.com/datacenter.php?pk_campaign=LowEndTalk&pk_kwd=Thread29April13)


TestFiles/TestIPs/LookingGlass: https://lg.rootnerds.com/


Our other plans: [http://www.rootnerds.com/vps.php](http://www.rootnerds.com/vps.php?pk_campaign=LowEndTalk&pk_kwd=Thread29April13)

**LET Special:**
2 €/Month (recurring) - [Order](https://billing.rootnerds.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&pk_campaign=LowEndTalk&pk_kwd=Thread29April13) - PromoCode: 5COD3BW3BF
2 Cores
256 MB RAM
128 MB vSWAP
10 GB HDD Hardware RAID 10
Fair use traffic. If you need more than 1 TB every month, we might need to talk to you.
1 IPv4 included
10 IPv6 - more on request
